events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am not satisfied with the product.
The support system has categorized the case under 'Refund' based on keywords related to return and money back mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to agent Jessica M. who handles refund requests and return processing for apparel products.
Hello! This is Jessica from customer support. I understand you would like to request a refund for your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let me know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way to proceed with the refund process?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 8273645, and the jacket is brand new; I have only tried it on once and returned it unworn as per your return policy.

Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and the refund will be processed within 5 business days after receipt.
That sounds perfect, thanks! I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the shipping label email soon so I can return the jacket promptly.
The refund request has been processed successfully in our system. Please check your email for the shipping label and return instructions to complete the refund.
Just following up to ensure you received the shipping label email and to check if the refund process went smoothly once the jacket was returned.
Yes, I received the label and returned the jacket last week. The refund was credited to my account yesterday. Thanks again for your excellent support.
We are glad your refund was completed successfully. We are closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to contact us again if you need further assistance.
